summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a Memorandum of Understanding between The City of Seattle and the International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 27, amending Articles 5, 7, 8 and 21 of the existing collective bargaining agreement and delineating certain provisions related to the continuation of the 24-hour shift and 4-platoon system within the Fire Department during the period June 1, 1982, through August 31, 1983; ratifying and confirming certain employee positions in the Fire Department effective June 1, 1982, that were listed in the 1982 Budget and temporarily retitled by Ordinance 110500; superseding Ordinance 110500 and any other inconsistent ordinance; and providing payment therefor.
